name: Elfplay
overview:
Elfplay designs and develops outstanding applications for iPhone, iPad, Mobile, Android, RIM and the Web. We have expertise in developing Casino and Slot games for Mobile including Native iPhone and Android applications, HTML5 web based applications and desktop browsers. Our product suite contains slot games and casino games including roulette, blackjack, video poker and scratch cards.

Our strength lies in expertise in mobile development which includes HTML5, Native iPhone and iPad applications and Native Android applications for mobile and tablets. We have built an amazing mobile platforms to facilitate the mobile development and produce fast, optimized and robust mobile applications.

Elfplay has also developed a social gaming platform which will enable players play casino/casual game on Facebook and other social networks.
